name: Foaming Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle foaming cleanser that removes excess oil while supporting the skin barrier, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: A non-foaming cleanser that cleanses without stripping moisture, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Toleriane Purifying Foaming Cleanser
description: A gentle foaming cleanser that removes impurities and reduces shine, ideal for oily skin that is also sensitive.

name: Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser
description: A creamy cleanser that supports hydration and comfort, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Gentle Skin Cleanser
description: A mild cleanser that cleanses without irritation and helps keep skin comfortable, ideal for sensitive skin.

name: Ultra Gentle Hydrating Cleanser
description: A fragrance-free cleanser that helps protect the moisture barrier, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
description: A low-pH gel cleanser that refreshes skin and supports clearer pores, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Salicylic Acid Cleanser
description: A pore-clearing cleanser that helps reduce oil buildup and congestion, ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.

name: Oat Cleansing Balm
description: A nourishing balm cleanser that removes makeup while soothing dryness, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
description: A gentle micellar cleanser that removes makeup and impurities with minimal irritation, ideal for sensitive skin.

name: Cleanance Cleansing Gel
description: A cleansing gel that helps reduce excess oil while remaining gentle, ideal for oily and sensitive skin.

name: Calendula Deep Cleansing Foaming Face Wash
description: A foaming cleanser that removes daily buildup and excess oil, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Soy Face Cleanser
description: A soft gel cleanser that removes makeup and dirt while keeping skin comfortable, ideal for normal to dry skin.

name: Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser
description: A gentle cleanser that refreshes skin and supports hydration, ideal for normal and combination skin.

name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm
description: A cleansing balm that dissolves makeup and sunscreen without drying, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.
